get.summary: Lists all Accounts in a specific Auth Method.

post.summary: Creates a single Account in the provided Auth Method.
Sets the password for the provided Account.

version.description:
Version is used to ensure this resource has not changed.
The mutation will fail if the version does not match the latest known good version.

post.summary: Sets the password for the provided Account.

version.description:
Version is used to ensure this resource has not changed.
The mutation will fail if the version does not match the latest known good version.

post.summary: Creates a single Auth Method.
Authenticate a user to an scope and retrieve an authentication token.

parameters.description: The ID of the Auth Method in the system that should be used for authentication.
parameters.name: auth_method_id

attributes.description: Attributes are passed to the Auth Method; the valid keys and values depend on the type of Auth Method as well as the command.

token_type.description:
This can be "cookie" or "token". If not provided, "token" will be used. "cookie" activates a split-cookie method where the token is split partially between http-only and regular cookies in order
to keep it safe from rogue JS in the browser.

post.summary: Changes the state of an OIDC AuthMethod

attributes.description: The attributes specific to this auth method's state.

version.description:
Version is used to ensure this resource has not changed.
The mutation will fail if the version does not match the latest known good version.

get.summary: List all Host Sets under the specific Catalog.

post.summary: Create a Host Set.

parameters.description: The ID of the target. Required unless some combination of scope_id/scope_name and name are set.
parameters.name: id

host_id.description: An optional parameter allowing specification of the particular Host within the Target's configured Host Sets to connect to during this Session.

name.description: The name of the target. When using this, scope_id or scope_name must be set.

scope_id.description: The scope ID containing the target, if specifying the target by name.

scope_name.description: The scope name containing the target, if specifying the target by name.

managed_group_ids.title: Output only. managed_group_ids indicates IDs of the managed groups that currently contain this account

token.description: Output only. The token value, which will only be populated after authentication and is only ever visible to the end user whose login request resulted in this Auth Token being created.

user_id.description: Output only. The ID of the User associated with this Auth Token.

controller.api.resources.hostsets.v1.Hos.title: HostSet is a collection of Hosts created and managed by a Host Catalog

attributes.description: The attributes that are applicable for the specific Host Set type.

authorized_actions.description: Output only. The available actions on this resource for this user.

created_time.description: Output only. The time this resource was created.

description.description: Optional user-set description for identification purposes.

host_catalog_id.description: The Host Catalog of which this Host Set is a part.

host_ids.description: Output only. A list of Hosts in this Host Set.

id.description: Output only. The ID of the Host Set.

plugin.description: Output only. Plugin information for this resource.

preferred_endpoints.description:
multiple possible endpoints for a host. Preferences are specified by
"cidr:<valid IPv4/6 CIDR>" or "dns:<globbed name>", specifying which IP
address or DNS name out of a host's available possibilities should be
preferred. If no preferences are specified, a value will be chosen from
among all avialable values using a built-in priority order. May not be
valid for all plugin types.

scope.description: Output only. Scope information for this resource.

sync_interval_seconds.description:
An interger number of seconds indicating the amount of time that should
elapse between syncs of the host set. The interval will be applied to the
end of the previous sync operation, not the start. Setting to -1 will
disable syncing for that host set; setting to zero will cause the set to
use Boundary's default. The default may change between releases. May not
be valid for all plugin types.

type.description: The type of the Host Set.

updated_time.description: Output only. The time this resource was last updated.

version.description:
Version is used in mutation requests, after the initial creation, to ensure this resource has not changed.
The mutation will fail if the version does not match the latest known good version.

authorized_actions.description: Output only. The available actions on this resource for this user.

created_time.description: Output only. The time this resource was created.

description.description: Optional user-set description for identification purposes.

grant_scope_id.description: The Scope the grants will apply to. If the Role is at the global scope, this can be an org or project. If the Role is at an org scope, this can be a project within the org. It is invalid for this to be anything other than the Role's scope when the Role's scope is a project.

grant_strings.description: Output only. The grants that this role provides for its principals.

grants.description: Output only. The parsed grant information.

id.description: Output only. The ID of the Role.

principal_ids.description: Output only. The IDs (only) of principals that are assigned to this role.

principals.description: Output only. The principals that are assigned to this role.

scope.description: Output only. Scope information for this resource.

scope_id.description: The ID of the Scope containing this Role.

updated_time.description: Output only. The time this resource was last updated.

version.description:
Version is used in mutation requests, after the initial creation, to ensure this resource has not changed.
The mutation will fail if the version does not match the latest known good version.

primary_auth_method_id.title:
The ID of the primary auth method for this scope.  A primary auth method
is allowed to vivify users when new accounts are created and is the source for the users account info

scope.description: Output only. Scope information for this resource.

scope_id.description: The ID of the Scope this resource is in. If this is the "global" Scope this field will be empty.

updated_time.description: Output only. The time this resource was last updated.

The mutation will fail if the version does not match the latest known good version.

name.description: Output only. The name of the Scope, if any.

parent_scope_id.description: Output only. The ID of the parent Scope, if any. This field will be empty if this is the "global" scope.

type.description: Output only. The type of the Scope.

controller.api.resources.sessions.v1.Con.title: Connection contains information about a specific connection in a session

controller.api.resources.sessions.v1.Ses.title: Session contains all fields related to a Session resource

auth_token_id.description: Output only. The ID of the Auth Token used to authenticate.

authorized_actions.description: Output only. The available actions on this resource for this user.

certificate.description: Output only. The certificate generated for the session. Raw DER bytes.

connections.description: Output only. The associated connections with this session.

created_time.description: Output only. The time this resource was created.

endpoint.description: Output only. The endpoint of the Session; that is, the address to which the worker is proxying data.

expiration_time.description: Output only. After this time the connection will be expired, e.g. forcefully terminated.

host_id.description: Output only. The Host used by the Session.

host_set_id.description: Output only. The Host Set sourcing the Host for this Session.

id.description: Output only. The ID of the Session.

scope.description: Output only. Scope information for this resource.

scope_id.description: Output only. The Scope of the Session.

states.description: Output only. The states of this Session in descending order from the current state to the first.

status.description: Output only. The current status of this Session.

target_id.description: Output only. The ID of the Target that created this Session.

termination_reason.description: Output only. If the session is terminated, this provides a short description as to why.

type.description: Output only. Type of the Session (e.g. tcp).

updated_time.description: Output only. The time this resource was last updated.

user_id.description: Output only. The ID of the User that requested the Session.

version.description: Version is used when canceling this Session to ensure that the operation is acting on a known session state.

worker_info.description: Output only. Worker information given to the client.

end_time.description: Output only. The time the Session stopped being in this state.

start_time.description: Output only. The time the Session entered this state.

status.description: The status of the Session, e.g. "pending", "active", "canceling", "terminated".

credential_store_id.description: Output only. The Credential Store to which this Credential Library belongs.

description.description: Output only. The description of the Credential Library.

id.description: The ID of the Credential Library.

name.description: Output only.  The name of the Credential Library.

type.description: Output only. The type of the credential library.

credential_store_id.description: Output only. The Credential Store to which this Credential source belongs.

credential_type.description: Output only. The type of the credential, empty if unspecified.

description.description: Output only. The description of the Credential source.

id.description: The ID of the Credential. May be empty if the credential is dynamically generated from a library.

name.description: Output only. The name of the Credential source.

type.description: Output only. The type of the credential source (e.g. "vault"; not the type of the credential itself).

host_catalog_id.description: Output only. The Host Catalog to which this Host Set belongs.

id.description: Output only. The ID of the Host Set.

host_catalog_id.description: Output only. The Host Catalog to which this Host Source belongs.

id.description: Output only. The ID of the Host Set.

controller.api.resources.targets.v1.Sess.description: SessionAuthorization contains all fields related to authorization for a Session. It's in the Targets package because it's returned by a Target's authorize action.

authorization_token.description: Output only. The marshaled SessionAuthorizationData message containing all information that the proxy needs.

created_time.description: Output only. The time this resource was created.

credentials.description: Output only. The credentials for this session.

endpoint.description: Output only. The endpoint address that the worker will connect to, useful for setting TLS parameters.

host_id.description: Output only. The Host whose address is being used as the endpoint for this Session.

host_set_id.description: Output only. The Host Set containing the Host being used for this Session.

scope.description: Output only. Scope information for this resource.

session_id.description: Output only. The ID of the Session.

target_id.description: Output only. The ID of the Target authorizing this Session.

type.description: Output only. Type of the Session (e.g. tcp, ssh, etc.).

user_id.description: Output only. The User for which this Session was authorized.

credential.description:
Output only. The fields of the strongly typed credential, empty if the credential type of the 
credential source is unspecified.

credential_library.description: Output only. The library which generated this credential. Deprecated: use credential_source instead.

credential_source.description: Output only. The credential source information.

secret.description: Output only. The secret of this credential base64 encoded.

controller.api.resources.targets.v1.Sess.description: The actual secret for a session credential.

decoded.description: Output only. The decoded raw string, if a JSON object.

raw.description:
Output only. The base64-encoded value representing the raw bytes from the
credential provider.

controller.api.resources.targets.v1.Targ.title: Target contains all fields related to a Target resource

application_credential_libraries.description: Output only. The application credential libraries associated with this Target. Deprecated: use application_credential_sources instead.

application_credential_library_ids.description: Output only. The IDs of the application credential library ids associated with this Target. Deprecated: use application_credential_source_ids instead.

application_credential_source_ids.description: Output only. The IDs of the application credential source ids associated with this Target.

application_credential_sources.description: Output only. The application credential sources associated with this Target.

attributes.description: The attributes that are applicable for the specific Target.

authorized_actions.description: Output only. The available actions on this resource for this user.

created_time.description: Output only. The time this resource was created.

description.description: Optional user-set description for identification purposes.

egress_credential_source_ids.description: Output only. The IDs of the egress credential source ids associated with this Target.

egress_credential_sources.description: Output only. The egress credential sources associated with this Target.

host_set_ids.description: Output only. The IDs of the Host Sets associated with this Target.

host_sets.description: Output only. The Host Sets associated with this Target.

host_source_ids.description: Output only. The IDs of the Host Sources associated with this Target.

host_sources.description: Output only. The Host Sources associated with this Target.

id.description: Output only. The ID of the resource.

scope.description: Output only. Scope information for this resource.

scope_id.description: The Scope of of this resource. This must be defined for creation of this resource, but is otherwise output only.

session_connection_limit.description: Maximum number of connections allowed in a Session.  Unlimited is indicated by the value -1.

session_max_seconds.description: Maximum total lifetime of a created Session, in seconds.

updated_time.description: Output only. The time this resource was last updated.

version.description:
Version is used in mutation requests, after the initial creation, to ensure this resource has not changed.
The mutation will fail if the version does not match the latest known good version.

worker_filter.description: Optional boolean expression to filter the workers that are allowed to satisfy this request.

id.description: Output only. The ID of the Account.

scope_id.description: Output only. The Scope containing the Account.

controller.api.resources.users.v1.User.title: User contains all fields related to a User resource

account_ids.description: Output only. Contains the list of Account IDs linked to this User.

accounts.description: Output only. The Accounts linked to this User.

authorized_actions.description: Output only. The available actions on this resource for this user.

created_time.description: Output only. The time this resource was created.

description.description: Optional user-set description for identification purposes.

email.title:
Output only. email is a string that maps to the user's account email from
the scope's primary auth method

full_name.title:
Output only. full_name is a string that maps to the user's account name
from the scope's primary auth method

id.description: Output only. The ID of the User.

login_name.title:
Output only. login_name is a string that maps to the user's account "login
name" from the scope's primary auth method

primary_account_id.title:
Output only. primary_account_id is a string that maps to the user's account
public_id from the scope's primary auth method

scope.description: Output only. Scope information for this resource.

scope_id.description: The ID of the Scope this resource is in.

updated_time.description: Output only. The time this resource was last updated.

version.description:
Version is used in mutation requests, after the initial creation, to ensure this resource has not changed.
The mutation will fail if the version does not match the latest known good version.

attributes.description: Valid keys and values depend on the type of Auth Method as well as the command.

google.protobuf.NullValue.description:
`NullValue` is a singleton enumeration to represent the null value for the
`Value` type union.

 The JSON representation for `NullValue` is JSON `null`.

 - NULL_VALUE: Null value.
